name: jaunt-data-scout-contracts
description: Contract artifacts and schema validation for Jaunt Data Scout

scripts.validate-schemas: npm run validate:frontier-web && npm run validate:frontier-maps && npm run validate:canonical-candidate && npm run validate:extraction-web
scripts.compile-schemas: for schema in schemas/*.json; do echo "Compiling $schema:"; ajv compile -s "$schema" --spec=draft7; done
scripts.validate-all: npm run compile-schemas && npm run validate-schemas

author: Jaunt Data Scout Team
